title: November 22, 2010
content:
Updates: fruit vs cancer; red wine (resveratrol) vs diabetes; calorie restriction, longevity; urban farming;... <!--more--> pommegranate, heart health; perceptions of global warming.

“Power and the Tiny Acts of Rebellion” [Chris Hedges 22Nov10 www.truthdig.
com] There is no hope left for achieving significant reform or restoring our democracy through established mechanisms of power.

Darryl Rogers- S.510- issues, considerations, what’s it really for, who’s behind it, Mike Adams- Food Safety Bill- S.
510- [Senate Bill 510 Food Safety?
Or The FDA has killed far more people than contaminated eggs or lettuce- 20nov10 or 16nov10?]
